personal.name: John Doe
personal.title: Frontend Developer
personal.bio: I craft beautiful, user-centric digital experiences with modern web technologies. Passionate about clean code and stunning interfaces.
aboutMe: I'm a frontend developer with a passion for creating beautiful, functional, and user-centered digital experiences. With 5+ years of experience in the field, I've had the privilege of working with startups, agencies, and large corporations.

I believe that great design is not just about how things look, but how they work. My approach combines aesthetics with functionality, creating interfaces that are both visually stunning and highly performant.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Building responsive and performant web applications using modern frameworks and best practices.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: Creating intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces with attention to detail.

services.title: Interactive Experiences
services.description: Crafting engaging animations and interactions that delight users.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer
experience.description: Leading frontend development for enterprise applications, mentoring junior developers, and implementing best practices.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Developed responsive web applications for various clients using React, Next.js, and modern CSS frameworks.

experience.title: Junior Developer
experience.description: Built and maintained web interfaces, collaborated with design team, and learned agile methodologies.

education.description: Focused on software engineering and web technologies. Graduated with honors.
